summary: Illdi, bard, entertainment at the Thalmor Embassy, may be a follower.... and wife.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/15/illdi.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]Get [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3806]Lisette Wife Companion[/url] too![/center]
[center]Get [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4001]Alva Wife Companion - Vampire[/url] too![/center]
[center]Get [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3983]Hroki Wife Companion[/url] too![/center]

[u]Description[/u]
This mod allows for Illdi of Solitude\'s Bard College to be both your wife and follower companion. You may also find her playing the flute at the Thalmor Embassy in the quest \"Diplomatic Immunity.\"

Plugin includes:
- Leather Armor for her basic traveling armor (in combat).
- Package adjustments to allow her to do her job.
- upgraded weapons and spells, although I\'m still working out spell use.

[u]Install:[/u]
Place \"Illdi.esp\" in your \\Skyrim\\Data\\ folder.
Read the uploaded Readme on how to get her, even if you have a current wife.

[u]Uninstall:[/u]
Delete \"Illdi.esp\" 

[u]Credits:[/u]
Bethesda
me

Alter the mod as you see fit, but I will be improving it more when CK comes out.

[u]Other notes:[/u] While testing Illdi with Hroki and Lydia, I found that Delphine could invite all 3 to be Blades. Considering, they are not normal followers, it works very well. See pics.

[u]Bugs:[/u]
See the online readme.

- Aoikani
